name: Once Upon a Time (itch) (rifkik)
description:
Once Upon a Time Game Subject: A young science person who interested in time traveling, accidently travels back in time and brokes his machine so that he can't go back his normal time. After that, he finds some clues to figure out for repairing time machine. Someone gives him a lot of clue about time machine and how it works. While he was trying to find these clues, he realize that the person who give some informatin about time machine, it was him. And he finally understood that he is in a loop and he try every way to break this loop and go back in her normal life.

 Creators: 

Code, Level Design, Animation, Game Design : Rıfkı Kesepara 

Game Design, Code , Level Design : Haydar Can Karabacak 

Voice : Kaan Sölmez 

Story, Game Design : Senem Özca
